roleset.name: able to be seen
roleset.note: VISIBLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. Loose relation to 'envision'. (from visible.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Usually this kind of event is only visible to us ' Ameatur model watchers ' model meaning computer model :P , but I ll share it with you .
example.arg: to us ' Ameatur model watchers' model meaning computer model :P
